unnormalised: **Exam Prep Apps: Your Secret Weapon for Acing Those Tests?**
normalised: **Exam Prep Apps: Your Secret Weapon for Acing Those Tests?**

unnormalised: Forget sleepless nights fuelled by endless cups of chai! Exam prep apps are the new must-have for students across India, from IIT aspirants in Kota to those gearing up for the UPSC in Delhi.
normalised: Forget sleepless nights fuelled by endless cups of chai! Exam prep apps are the new must-have for students across India, from I I T aspirants in Kota to those gearing up for the U P S C in Delhi.

unnormalised: These apps, packed with mock tests, video lectures, and personalized study plans, are changing the game. Think of them as your pocket-sized Guru, available 24/7. Forget expensive coaching centres charging Rs. 50,000 or more - many offer affordable subscription models.
normalised: These apps, packed with mock tests, video lectures, and personalized study plans, are changing the game. Think of them as your pocket-sized Guru, available twenty four seven. Forget expensive coaching centres charging rupee fifty thousand or more - many offer affordable subscription models.

unnormalised: One popular app, "ShikshaSaathi," even uses AI to predict likely questions, kind of like knowing which ingredients will make the most delicious biryani!
normalised: One popular app, "ShikshaSaathi," even uses A I to predict likely questions, kind of like knowing which ingredients will make the most delicious biryani!

unnormalised: But are they *really* effective? Experts say it depends on the student. You still gotta put in the hours! Just downloading the app won't guarantee success, unlike a perfectly timed Onam Sadhya. Still, they offer a convenient way to track progress and boost confidence, maybe shaving off those crucial extra marks. It's like having a secret cheat code, but for learning!
normalised: But are they *really* effective? Experts say it depends on the student. You still gotta put in the hours! Just downloading the app won't guarantee success, unlike a perfectly timed Onam Sadhya. Still, they offer a convenient way to track progress and boost confidence, maybe shaving off those crucial extra marks. It's like having a secret cheat code, but for learning!
